mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_user (user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_age) Values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail} ,#{userGender}, #{userAge})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_age from m_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_num, rate_num, movie_num, rate_review , rate_score, rate_date, rate_like FROM m_rate WHERE user_num = #{userNum}

SELECT mu.user_num, mu.user_id, mu.user_point, mu.user_grade, mm.movie_num, mm.movie_title, mr.rate_review FROM m_user mu JOIN m_rate mr ON mu.user_num = mr.user_num JOIN m_movie mm ON mr.movie_num = mm.movie_num where mu.user_num = #{userNum};

SELECT m_movie.movie_num, m_movie.movie_title, m_movie.movie_info, m_img.img_url FROM m_movie INNER JOIN m_img ON m_movie.movie_num = m_img.movie_num INNER JOIN m_interest ON m_movie.movie_num = m_interest.movie_num where m_movie.movie_num = #{movieNum};
